metadata.title: CVE-2021-30458 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Wikimedia Parsoid before 0.11.1 and 0.12.xbefore 0.12.2. An attacker can send crafted wikitext that Utils/WTUtils.phpwill transform by using a <meta> tag, bypassing sanitization steps, andpotentially allowing for XSS.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
